description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙、雍正两朝重臣，佟国维之子，康熙帝表弟，孝懿仁皇后之弟。
description.en: An important official during the Kangxi and Yongzheng eras of the Qing Dynasty, son of Tung-gowei, cousin of the Kangxi Emperor, and younger brother of Empress Xiaoyiren.

description.zh-cn: 清朝大臣，隆科多之父，康熙帝舅父。
description.en: A minister of the Qing Dynasty, father of Longkodo, and maternal uncle of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，佟国维之父，隆科多之祖父。
description.en: An official of the Qing Dynasty, father of Tung-gowei, and grandfather of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，隆科多伯父。
description.en: An official of the Qing Dynasty, paternal uncle of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，隆科多伯父。
description.en: An official of the Qing Dynasty, paternal uncle of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，隆科多的表兄。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, cousin of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，康熙帝第四子。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第三任皇后，佟国维之女，隆科多之姊。
description.en: The third empress of the Kangxi Emperor, daughter of Tung-gowei, and elder sister of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝皇贵妃，隆科多之姊。
description.en: Imperial Noble Consort of the Kangxi Emperor, elder sister of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多次子。
description.en: Second son of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 雍正时期为了打击政治异己而发动的政治运动。
description.en: A political campaign launched during the Yongzheng era to suppress political dissent.

description.zh-cn: 清朝雍正时期重臣，后被雍正帝赐死。
description.en: An important official during the Yongzheng era of the Qing Dynasty, later forced to commit suicide by the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China.

description.zh-cn: 清朝皇家园林，位于北京。
description.en: A former imperial garden of the Qing Dynasty, located in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 满洲八大姓之一。
description.en: One of the eight great Manchu clans.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一，上三旗之首。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing Dynasty, and the head of the Upper Three Banners.

description.zh-cn: 清朝掌管蒙古、西藏等少数民族事务的中央机构。
description.en: The central government agency of the Qing Dynasty responsible for the affairs of ethnic minorities such as the Mongols and Tibetans.

description.zh-cn: 清朝负责京师卫戍、警备和治安的官职，俗称九门提督。
description.en: An official position in the Qing Dynasty responsible for the garrison, security, and public order of the capital, commonly known as the Commander of the Nine Gates.

description.zh-cn: 清朝掌管皇帝仪仗、车驾等事务的官职。
description.en: An official position in the Qing Dynasty in charge of the emperor's ceremonial guard, carriages, etc.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一，下五旗之一。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing Dynasty, one of the Lower Five Banners.

description.zh-cn: 清朝辅政大臣的一种称谓。
description.en: A title for regent ministers in the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝吏部最高长官，掌管全国文职官吏的任免、考核、升降、调动等。
description.en: The highest official of the Ministry of Personnel in the Qing Dynasty, responsible for the appointment, assessment, promotion, demotion, and transfer of civil officials nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第八子，雍正帝的政治对手。
description.en: The eighth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a political rival of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第九子，雍正帝的政治对手。
description.en: The ninth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a political rival of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，隆科多堂兄弟。
description.en: An official of the Qing Dynasty, cousin of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多是佟国维之子。
description.en: Longkodo was the son of Tung-gowei.

description.zh-cn: 佟国维是佟图赖之子，隆科多是佟图赖之孙。
description.en: Tung-gowei was the son of Tulai, and Longkodo was the grandson of Tulai.

description.zh-cn: 佟国纲是隆科多的二伯父。
description.en: Tung-gogang was Longkodo's second paternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 佟国纪是隆科多的大伯父。
description.en: Tong Guoji was Longkodo's eldest paternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多是康熙帝的表弟。
description.en: Longkodo was the Kangxi Emperor's maternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝称隆科多为舅舅，因为隆科多的姐姐孝懿仁皇后是雍正帝的嫡母。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor addressed Longkodo as 'maternal uncle' because Longkodo's sister, Empress Xiaoyiren, was Yongzheng's adoptive mother.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多是孝懿仁皇后的弟弟。
description.en: Longkodo was the younger brother of Empress Xiaoyiren.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多是悫惠皇贵妃的弟弟。
description.en: Longkodo was the younger brother of Imperial Noble Consort Quehui.

description.zh-cn: 岳兴阿是隆科多的长子。
description.en: Yuexing'a was the eldest son of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 玉柱是隆科多的次子。
description.en: Yuzhu was the second son of Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多是满洲镶黄旗人。
description.en: Longkodo was a Manchu of the Bordered Yellow Banner.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多出身于佟佳氏家族。
description.en: Longkodo was from the Tonggiya clan.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多于康熙五十年至雍正三年担任步军统领。
description.en: Longkodo served as the Infantry Commander from 1711 to 1725.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多于康熙六十一年被任命为吏部尚书。
description.en: Longkodo was appointed Minister of Personnel in the 61st year of Kangxi's reign.

description.zh-cn: 因所属人违法，康熙帝责备隆科多不实心任事，罢免其副都统、銮仪使职务。
description.en: Due to illegal activities by his subordinates, the Kangxi Emperor reprimanded Longkodo for dereliction of duty and dismissed him from his posts as Deputy Commander and Master of the Imperial Guard.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝于康熙五十年授予隆科多步军统领之职。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor appointed Longkodo as the Infantry Commander in the 50th year of his reign (1711).

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝继位后，立即封隆科多为总理事务大臣、吏部尚书，加太保等职务，使其成为两朝重臣。
description.en: Upon his accession, the Yongzheng Emperor immediately appointed Longkodo as Grand Minister Regent and Minister of Personnel, with the additional title of Grand Tutor, making him a powerful figure spanning two reigns.

description.zh-cn: 雍正五年，隆科多被定41款大罪，雍正帝下令从宽，将其在畅春园外禁锢，直至其于次年六月死于禁所。
description.en: In the fifth year of the Yongzheng reign (1727), Longkodo was convicted of 41 major crimes. The emperor showed leniency by commuting his sentence to confinement outside the Changchun Garden, where he died in June of the following year.

description.zh-cn: 雍正时期大兴的文字狱，其打击范围波及到了隆科多。
description.en: The literary inquisitions during the Yongzheng era also implicated Longkodo.

description.zh-cn: 雍正时期大兴的文字狱，其打击范围波及到了年羹尧。
description.en: The literary inquisitions during the Yongzheng era also implicated Nian Gengyao.

description.zh-cn: 夸岱是隆科多的堂兄弟。
description.en: Kuadai was Longkodo's paternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 雍正三年，在调查隆科多藏匿赃银之事时，夸岱将隆科多之子玉柱上锁并施以刑讯逼供。
description.en: In 1725, during the investigation into Longkodo's hidden illicit wealth, Kuadai shackled and tortured Longkodo's son, Yuzhu, to extract a confession.
